mapper.insert: insert into tbl_esti_reply (rno, eno, compname, compphone, price, reply, replyer) values (seq_esti_reply.nextval, #{eno}, #{compname},#{compphone},#{price}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update tbl_esti_reply set reply = #{reply},updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from tbl_esti_reply where eno = #{eno}
